As i've mentioned in the title, i'm getting consistant micro stutter that happens for like a few millisecond every 5seconds or so. And for some reason my gpu goes crazy when im on space center screen. (Pics  below) it goes to 100% usage and temp goes over 80 degrees.... how and why would it be?

https://imgur.com/mvyY13M

https://imgur.com/Tign7Hb

can this all be related to heap padder thing? i have taken a screenshot of it in the debug menu(pic above)

I'm on ksp 1.9.1, i5 6500, gtx1060, 16gb ram. I have some mods that are supported upto 1.8.1. Can this be the cause of all of these issues?

I'd start by removing EVE and Scatterer, first. The clouds can place a heavy load on the GPU. I had some stutter in the (otherwise stock) KSC scene, too, not at regular time intervals but specific viewing angles.

Any exception spam in the log?

Edited June 5, 2020 by HansAcker

@HansAcker

Any exception spam in the log?

Yes i did get spams when i loaded in duna scenario(which is included in the stock game) that said

nullreferenceexception: object reference not set to an instance of an object.

But i’ve only seen it happen once... i’ll have to take a closer look at it.

The problem is i didn’t have any issues with my game when i had only graphical mods installed (EVE, scatterer, AVP), my frames started dropping and stuttered when i installed bunch of mods.

Should i be worried that my vram is at 95% usage? Could this be related?
